category: Member Sports Organization Regulations/Article 7 (Composition and Function of General Meeting)
contents: Article 7 (Composition and functions of the general meeting) ① The general meeting of the member sports organization shall be composed of the following representatives. 1. The head of a city/provincial sports organization under Article 5, Paragraph 1. 2. The head of a national federation under Article 5, Paragraph 3. ② If the delegate under Paragraph 1 is unable to attend the general meeting for unavoidable reasons, a representative among the vice presidents. may be nominated to attend. In this case, the representative's authority is the same as that of the representative only at the relevant general meeting. Revised on April 28, 2016. ③ If a representative is appointed pursuant to paragraph 2, the fact must be notified in writing (including electronic documents) to the member sports organization by the day before the general meeting. Revised December 26, 2022. ④ If there are difficulties in forming a general meeting because the number of delegates under Paragraph 1 is less than 9, registered teams and sports enthusiast organizations (sports clubs) according to Article 29 Paragraph 4 Items 1 and 2 may be registered. A general meeting can be formed including the following chapters. Revised on October 6, 2021. ⑤ Member sports organizations with less than 9 delegates, including the delegates in Paragraph 4, may form separate delegates with the approval of the Sports Council. ⑥ If a person with representative qualifications in accordance with paragraph 1 becomes an executive of a member sports organization, he or she will lose his/her representative qualifications, and a vice president recommended by the relevant organization will become a representative. ⑦ If the representative under paragraph (1) is replaced during his/her term of office, the approval of the city/provincial sports council must be reported to the member sports organization. Newly established on April 25, 2018. ⑧ Executives of member sports organizations cannot serve as representatives or agents of representatives. Newly established 2017. 8. 7. ⑨ The general meeting of member sports organizations shall decide on the following matters. Revised 2017. 8. 7., 2019. 5. 29., 2021. 10. 6. 1. Matters regarding dissolution of member sports organizations and changes to articles of incorporation 2. Establishment and membership of city/provincial sports organizations and national federations and expulsion 3. Matters related to the election of executives of member sports organizations, increase in the number of directors, and dismissal of executives 4. Matters related to business results and settlement of accounts 5. Deleted May 29, 6, 2019 Other important matters ⑩ According to Article 12 of the Sports Association Articles of Incorporation. Accordingly, representatives of each item of Paragraph 1 of a member sport organization designated as a management organization shall be suspended from their duties as head of their organization for two years from the date of designation as a management organization. However, depending on the operating situation of the management organization, the period of suspension may be determined differently through a resolution by the athletic association board of directors. Newly established on December 27, 2021. [Fully revised on March 23, 2017]
